Text:
I really hope we keep hearing that every week!

Just know, that if you leave, the e-comic viewers across the world will be devastated, and the kingdom of torrenting comics will forever be in ruins.

Thanks for all the comics you ever provided.
Don't overreact Cvalin, there's always the (much superior) DCP-pack that still comes out twice a week. Now if THAT stops, we e-comic fans will have a real problem!
But of course, thanks for all the trouble!
I'll just give my deeply felt "thank you" and hope you change your mind man.

Thank You!
When Demonoid and ZCult disapeared I discovered your work, that has been great.
A splendid mix of new, old and favorites - me like...
/ Live well...
Thanks for all your torrents and best of luck in all of your future endeavors!

Your awesome!! Thanks very much!!!
Maybe do you have Noble Causes (anything after issue15 please)
if not thanks for all you have done
What software do you need to see this?

Petter8005 asked: What software do you need to see this?

That depends. If you're a Windows user, then CDisplay works quite nicely.
When is the next upload coming?? Great work btw..
Thanks man. If it wasn't for you I woudn't of known of the Planet Hulk series. It cost me $40 for the hardcover edition, but was well worth it
First, I want to say thanks for all the great uploads. I was wondering where we would go to request other comic books. I need Madame Mirage #4. Thanks again.
Good work! sbm_from_la.  Appreciate the hard work you put together this nice collection.
